text_block_list.text: On the way to the trainer's room, two horse-girls emerged from the classroom, along with voices arguing.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Shut up! I can't concentrate!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: It's cleaning time right now! Why don't you record the motorcycle race?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: There's no point unless it's live! You don't understand romance.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What's so romantic about that?! Don't act so self-important until you do what you have to do!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ugh…!! Ugh… Sh-Shut up!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Someone who wants to clean can do it!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Are you going to throw it all at me!? You… you idiot!!
After that, I saw vodka behind the Academy building. The white-hot reality of the motorcycle race was flowing from her phone.
However, in contrast to the excitement, Vodka had a somewhat absent expression.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aaah, dammit! What the hell…! This can't be happening… Aaah, geez!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: You were in the hallway just now…… I didn't want to be seen.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlett's words have been running through my head all this time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What's so romantic about that?! Don't act so self-important until you do what you have to do!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: She's right… I can't believe she's throwing away what she has to do…

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: It's way too lame! Dammit!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm sure……she's just as shocked……

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: …Yeah. That's the only way!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry! I did something bad to her! I'll never do something like this again!
And then――

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay, get out of the way. You're in the way of trash.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlett! D-Did you hear that?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Hmph, I heard it all on my own. Did I do something bad to her?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: So, who is this guy?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Ugh… D-Don't ask me that! More importantly, give me the trash bag! I'll clean it too!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Okay, okay. …So, who is she?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Th-That's enough of that! That's her!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What? I don't get it at all. I want to hear it straight from you!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I wonder if I can do it… No, I have no choice.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I won't run away! I'll apologize!
And then――

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: You were here? So, who's going to apologize?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Scarlett! Perfect timing! U-Um…!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I'm sorry for skipping out on cleaning…! I was just thinking about myself, so…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: *sigh* It's fine, geez. But in exchange, you need to start over from here.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Of course I do! I'll clean you up to the point where you'll lose your cool!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: All right, let's do this! Wipe, clean, I'll clean.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: The guy who was slacking off was acting all high and mighty…

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Oh, by the way, have you finished relaying the bike race?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: No, I'm still doing it. But now's not the time.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Wow… You're awfully serious. Did you eat something bad?

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I don't want to eat that. I want to settle things.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: I don't have the right to admire cool stuff if I don't do something!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: …Yeah, yeah, you're the same as always.

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: All right, you rest up! I'll take care of everything else!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Doryaryaryarya!!
Vodka violently moved her broom, and a large amount of dust flew into the air……

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Cough, cough! Stop, stop!!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: What are you doing?! Did you come back to make a mess?!

text_block_list.name: Vodka
text_block_list.text: Open the window and blow the dust into the wind! What do you think, genius?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: It's an idiot's idea, and it won't get dust outside! You really are…!!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: What the hell!!
